title: Charles Angrand Boxed Note Cards
description:
This stunning collection of note cards features the timeless and captivating artwork of one of the most innovative and talented Neo-Impressionist painters of the late 19th century, Charles Angrand.

Set includes 16 note cards showcasing four of Angrand's most mesmerizing works. These cards exude a sense of sophistication and elegance that is sure to make a lasting impression on anyone who receives them. Whether you're sending a heartfelt message of appreciation, congratulations, or simply saying hello to a friend, this set provides the perfect canvas to express your thoughts and emotions.

  • Dimensions: 5.4 x 7.1 in.
  • 16 cards, 17 envelopes
  • 4 images, 4 cards each
